data.text: @EU_Commission Please do not rely on member states to tell their citizens what you are planning and doing.  Advertise directly and widely.  Europeans should be aware of what the Community does for them and proud of it.  And if they are not you need to know.
@EU_Commission Show your expenses allowance 👍

@EU_Commission 3,)Everything starts with the Government of the EMU, with the right Worksteps to the right time, when not, everything will destroyed. So easy is it to explain 😋 And the Ch. Angela Merkel has already many Worksteps prevented in the last over 5 years😋 Almost 5 years to late now😋

@EU_Commission 2,)The Uniform Minimum Wage in the EMU is the prerequisite for a better Europe and for many Worksteps,,and you Guys know this or?

The Uniform Minimum Wage in the EMU is also thought for it, that the EMU more moves closer together, but a.o. the Ch.Angela Merkel has prevented it😋

@EU_Commission 1,) Imagine, the State Owned Apartments Blocks, with State Owned Apartments for fair Rental price ? The more fair the Rental price, the more have the People a good manage for the month ? And then the People have the Money for Hybridcars ? And this for the EMU 😋

@EU_Commission Play fair with the UK, allow us too leave on fair terms, and the future will be better for all of us. I'm really hoping the EU's recession doesn't happen in the next 24 months as predicted too, good luck 👍
@EU_Commission Resign.  Happy Christmas🎄
@EU_Commission If you want us to stay you have to undo Lisbon & maastricht

@EU_Commission L'eredità culturale di questo continente è l'insieme delle eredità di ogni singola nazione. Non esiste una eredità culturale l€uropea. E voi importate schiavi neri anche per scardinare la nostra diversità in un orrendo m€lting pot.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @SOYMIGUELLAGO  eres tu? En serio, parecido muy razonable...

@EU_Commission @xosewist They migrate in empty lands, full of opportunities. Now, in 2018, is not the case anymore.  Simply as that. Stop to make sooo many childrens per family. This will be real politic to look on....

@EU_Commission No, you're not free to go through the Schengen area of Europe. #Austria slows and blocks border traffic (like right now) on its border with Hungary just to please the Nazis in their government. @sebastiankurz @MFA_Austria

#SaveYourInternet #SaveTheinternet #StopActa2 #StopCensureCopyright #EU #World
@EU_Commission What a sweet film. I am so sad and angry that my government intends to take away my EU citizenship rights.
@EU_Commission something our British Government are taking away from the millions of us who wish to remain Europeans. Please help us...
@EU_Commission Avete abbandonato un paese intero, la Grecia, 5 milioni di poveri assoluti solo in Italia, altri milioni in Portogallo, Spagna, Irlanda, Francia. L’Europa vi odia.

@EU_Commission On the contrary,
#EU proposed
new #eVAT tax

Instead of simplifing, you make things overregulated.

I received 45 page document issued by the European Commission about the new EU #ecommerce regulations.

You are NOT helping small #business! You are making compliance costs higher!

@EU_Commission Your Brexit Contingency Action Plan is putting about the falsehood that post-Brexit, British people will be treated like third-country visitors. Not true. We will continue to be EU citizens, as per TFEU art.20 and Case C‑184/99 Grzelczyk [2001]. Please correct.
@EU_Commission Why don’t You make Europe for Europeans, same medical regulations, same technical regulations, Make Europe for Europeans

@EU_Commission @EUClimateAction @EU_ENV Funny to be so obsessed by the plastic cups and at the same time neglect the fact that the content of your cup is polluted by cancerogen chemical products used in agriculture thanks to the authorizations of the Commission. I am not sure this will improve the image of the Comm

@EU_Commission @TimmermansEU @jyrkikatainen @KarmenuVella @EU_ENV Good joke: no more q-tips but thousands of dangerous chemical products such as #glyphosate still authorized. For sure there is scientific evidence proving q-tips are more dangerous for biodiversity than chemicals in agriculture
@EU_Commission @KarmenuVella @EBrivioEU With added plastic for free
@EU_Commission EU: The future of the World.
@EU_Commission But you have abandoned us: 1.3 million British citizens living in the EU. 100 days till Brexit and we are still in limbo.
@EU_Commission @KarmenuVella @EBrivioEU SWEXIT!
@EU_Commission quick question, why can’t you get refund on a flight tickets ✈️? makes no sense. You should be able to get refund like up to two days before flight. Please fix it

@EU_Commission SWEXIT! 💕

@EU_Commission Why do you hate the people of Gibraltar so much? 96% in favour of staying yet EU behaviour towards Gibraltar been shameful. Excluding Gibraltar now is discriminatory & in violation of Directive 2000/43/EC against discrimination on grounds of race and ethnic origin.

Excluding Gibraltar now is discriminatory and in violation of Directive 2000/43/EC against discrimination on grounds of race and ethnic origin.

@EU_Commission good

@EU_Commission Me? I want less EU. In fact, none of it. Zero.

@EU_Commission I'm British and I want to stay in the EU.  I'm worried about the centralised structure of the EU and the fact that so many people find it less than perfectly democratic.  It needs reform, not breaking up.  Biggest threat is widening gap of rich vs poor.

@EU_Commission Elections?! What are you talking about? What about new articles like 11th and 13th to the Internet and there are so many ridiculously unimportant laws and you are expecting young people to vote now? No way!

@EU_Commission @MarkAyresRWS Focus more on that than banning memes

@EU_Commission 404

@EU_Commission I remember a culturally rich Europe free of a globalist organisation. Independent currencies and where countries were not seen as EU states. Some have woken and others are awakening #FreeEurope 🎗
